SEARCH
模块 it.polimi.ingsw
程序包 it.polimi.ingsw.view.Gui

类 GUI

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
it.polimi.ingsw.view.Gui.GUI
所有已实现的接口:
Ui, Runnable
public class GUI extends Thread implements Ui
Represents the graphical user interface for the client-side application, handling interactions between the user interface elements and the game logic.

    • handleMessage

      public void handleMessage(GenericServerMessage msg)
      Handles incoming server messages by adding them to the processing queue.
      指定者:
      handleMessage 在接口中 Ui
      参数:
      msg - The server message to handle.

    • connect

      public void connect(Boolean isRmi, String ip) throws IOException
      Establishes a connection to the server based on the connection type (RMI or Socket).
      参数:
      isRmi - Indicates whether to use RMI for connection.
      ip - The IP address of the server.
      抛出:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while connecting.

    • run

      public void run()
      Starts the GUI thread for handling incoming messages from the server.
      指定者:
      run 在接口中 Runnable
      覆盖:
      run 在类中 Thread

    • handle

      public void handle(Message msg) throws IOException
      Handles different types of messages received from the server.
      参数:
      msg - The message received from the server to handle.
      抛出:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during message handling.

    • notify

      public void notify(Message msg) throws RemoteException
      Sends a message to the server for processing.
      参数:
      msg - The message to send to the server.
      抛出:
      RemoteException - If there is an issue with remote method invocation.
